title: Zoom In/out
body: Is there a way to debind the zoom in/out option in the config ? Because my mouse is super sensitive and sometimes it zooms when I don't want to.

replies.body:
There may be a way to, but since it's not an option offered in-game, we don't support that specific change, as it may break things. 

Let me know if you have any questions!
Can you please tell me how. I tried going into the config setting and the line of text but it doesn't seem to work. Please I beg you to help me.
may you give any reasonable reason to something so simple not be able to be disabled [considering every single other game i play have it]?
